title: Art Laffer makes his case for Nvidia stock amid AI optimism
text: Log in to comment on videos and join in on the fun. Watch the live stream of Fox News and full episodes. Reduce eye strain and focus on the content that matters. Former Council of Economic Advisers chairman Kevin Hassett and former Reagan economist Art Laffer join 'Kudlow' to discuss the surge in tech stocks amid artificial intelligence optimism. ©2024 FOX News Network, LLC.
